data.meanings: early part of morning, morrow, morning, time between the prayer of daybreak and sunrise, first part of the day
data.sentence: The word وَغَدَوْا comes from the root غ د و and is associated with the meanings: early part of morning, morrow, morning, time between the prayer of daybreak and sunrise, first part of the day

data.meanings: Withhold, hinder, restrain, prevent, shut out, resolve, be niggardly.
data.sentence: The word حَرْدٍ comes from the root ح ر د and is associated with the meanings: Withhold, hinder, restrain, prevent, shut out, resolve, be niggardly.

data.meanings: to measure/decree/determine/stint/straiten, to have power, to be able, a measure, means, ability, a term/decree, doom, destiny, measured, decreed.qudrun - knowledge, law, value, power, measure, majesty, ability, glory, honour, standard, limit, destiny. taqdir - knowledge, law, measuring decree, judgement, ordering. maqduran - made absolute, executed. miqdar - due measurement, definite quantity. qidr (pl. qudurun) - cooking pot. qaddara - to make possible, prepare, devise, lay plan, facilitate. muqtadir - powerful, able to prevail.
data.sentence: The word قَادِرِينَ comes from the root ق د ر and is associated with the meanings: to measure/decree/determine/stint/straiten, to have power, to be able, a measure, means, ability, a term/decree, doom, destiny, measured, decreed.qudrun - knowledge, law, value, power, measure, majesty, ability, glory, honour, standard, limit, destiny. taqdir - knowledge, law, measuring decree, judgement, ordering. maqduran - made absolute, executed. miqdar - due measurement, definite quantity. qidr (pl. qudurun) - cooking pot. qaddara - to make possible, prepare, devise, lay plan, facilitate. muqtadir - powerful, able to prevail.
